roleset.name: intend to use for some purpose

roles.note: Not sure if an arg0 agent can arise with adjectival usage, but it's there for symmetry with verb roleset and doesn't seem strictly impossible.

example.name: arg1 only
example.text: It is pure fluke who is working when any particular patient is there so should they be rewarded when other staff who-3 *T*-3 may be equally dedicated were n't on duty ?

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: The Memorial is dedicated to the 2.7 million men and women in the U.S. military.
example.arg: to the 2.7 million men and women in the U.S. military.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire.
